Instrument_PDS3.instrument_desc:
Instrument Overview =================== Charged coupled device (CCD) cameras from ESO were used by groups of scientists on a vaiety of telescopes to monitor the Halley outburst.
Scientific Objectives ===================== The main purpose of the observations were to monitor comet activity and gather images of comet Halley during its outburst in the period through Jan 1992. The initial data (1988-1989) were part of a monitoring program.
